doc:
/** Get the inverse (or pseudo-inverse) of the decomposed matrix.
     * @return inverse matrix
     * @throws SingularMatrixException
     * if the decomposed matrix is singular.
     */

/**
     * Computes the determinant of the matrix.
     *
     * @return the determinant of the matrix.
     */

/**
     * Gets a copy of the i<sup>th</sup> eigenvector of the original matrix.
     *
     * @param i Index of the eigenvector (counting from 0).
     * @return a copy of the i<sup>th</sup> eigenvector of the original matrix.
     * @see #getD()
     */

/**
     * Gets a copy of the real parts of the eigenvalues of the original matrix.
     *
     * @return a copy of the real parts of the eigenvalues of the original matrix.
     *
     * @see #getD()
     * @see #getRealEigenvalue(int)
     * @see #getImagEigenvalues()
     */

/** * Gets a solver for finding the A × X = B solution in exact * linear sense. *

* Since 3.1, eigen decomposition of a general matrix is supported, * but the {@link DecompositionSolver} only supports real eigenvalues. * * @return a solver * @throws MathUnsupportedOperationException if the decomposition resulted in * complex eigenvalues */

/**
     * Multiplies (in place) the specified entry of {@code this} matrix by the
     * specified value. Row and column indices start at 0.
     *
     * @param row Row index of the entry to be modified.
     * @param column Column index of the entry to be modified.
     * @param factor Multiplication factor for the matrix entry.
     * @throws OutOfRangeException if the row or column index is not valid.
     * @since 2.0
     */
code: void multiplyEntry(int row, int column, double factor) throws OutOfRangeException;

doc:
/**
     * Convert the vector to an array of {@code double}s.
     * The array is independent from this vector data: the elements
     * are copied.
     *
     * @return an array containing a copy of the vector elements.
     */

/**
     * Creates a copy of the {@code source} array.
     *
     * @param source Array to be copied.
     * @return the copied array.
     */
